mapper.select: SELECT ID,HTTPS,PASS_TOKEN,PASS_WORD, CASE TO_CHAR(ON_STATE) WHEN '0' THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS ON_STATE,REMARK,PSN_ID, CREATE_DATE,CREATE_ID,UPDATE_DATE,DEL_FLAG FROM SYS_PASS_WORD WHERE DEL_FLAG = '0' AND ID = #{passWord.ids} AND PSN_ID = #{passWord.psnId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_PASS_WORD SET HTTPS = #{passWord.https}, PASS_TOKEN = #{passWord.passToken}, PASS_WORD = #{passWord.passWord}, ON_STATE = #{passWord.onState}, REMARK = #{passWord.remark}, DEL_FLAG = #{passWord.delFlag}, UPDATE_DATE = #{passWord.updateDate} WHERE ID = #{passWord.ids}
